name: Cursed (itch) (LordKevep)
description:
You are cursed, hunter...

Welcome to Cursed, a 3 days, game jam project with the topic : "under 30 seconds".

You play as a hunter who have to track a beast and bring back it's head. Unfortunatelly, you got bitten by the creature cursed fangs. You only have 30 before you run out of time and die.

Cursed is a boss rush type of game where you can slow down time, parry and dash in order to win. But beware slowing down time might cost you your life...

Good luck hunter !
